192-255
128,124,121,118,115,112,109,106,103,100 ,97 ,93 ,90 ,88 ,85 ,82,
 79 ,76 ,73 ,70 ,67 ,65 ,62 ,59 ,57 ,54 ,52 ,49 ,47 ,44 ,42 ,40,
 37 ,35 ,33 ,31 ,29 ,27 ,25 ,23 ,21 ,20 ,18 ,17 ,15 ,14 ,12 ,11,
 10,  9,  7,  6,  5,  5,  4,  3,  2,  2,  1,  1,  1,  0,  0,  0,





  float pi = PI;

  PRINT("PI is "); PRINTLN(PI);
  bool first = true;
  for(word x = 0; x < 256; x++) {
    if (first) { Serial.println("sin()"); Serial.println(x); }
    int y = (int) (sin((pi * 2 / 256) * (x-64)) * 128 + 128);
    Serial.print(y); Serial.print(" ");
    if (x % 16 == 15) { Serial.println(); }
    first = false;
  }
  first = true;
  for(word x = 0; x < 256; x++) {
    if (first) { Serial.println("sine()"); }
    int y = sine(x);
    PRINT(y); PRINT(" ");
    if (x % 16 == 15) { PRINTLN(); }
    first = false;
  }
PI is 3.14

byte sin_256_255_q4[] = {
   0,  0,  0,  0,  1,  1,  1,  2,  2,  3,  4,  5,  5,  6,  7,  9,
  10 ,11 ,12 ,14 ,15 ,17 ,18 ,20 ,21 ,23 ,25 ,27 ,29 ,31 ,33 ,35,
  37 ,40 ,42 ,44 ,47 ,49 ,52 ,54 ,57 ,59 ,62 ,65 ,67 ,70 ,73 ,76,
  79 ,82 ,85 ,88 ,90 ,93 ,97,100,103,106,109,112,115,118,121,124
};

byte sine(byte x) {
  if ( x <  64 ) {
    return       sin_256_255_q4[     (x      )];
  }
  if ( x < 128 ) {
    return 255 - sin_256_255_q4[63 - (x -  64)];
  }
  if ( x < 192 ) {
    return 255 - sin_256_255_q4[     (x - 128)];
  }
  if ( x < 256 ) {
    return       sin_256_255_q4[63 - (x - 192)];
  }
}
